Name: Metanoia
About the game: Metanoia is a 3D first person adventure where you control an unidentified person within their mind. This game features a small open world style hub, a tropical island, that leads to several different levels each depicting a mental illness. Experience each world as they take on different genres, ranging from being a platformer to a mini-game collection. There are secrets to discover, beautiful stylistic views to capture and a whole realm of varied and unique themes to experience.
Meta Title: Metanoia: May 23, 2018, Yan Dawid and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Metanoia? Check out the release date (May 23, 2018), developer insights from Yan Dawid, and a complete game summary.
